feed.title: Happy Valley-Goose Bay - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Happy Valley-Goose Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:48 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -13.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Goose Bay 5:00 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Mainly Clear
Temperature: -13.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -16.9°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over higher terrain late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 over higher terrain late in the morning and in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 1 in the evening then falling. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 23 December 2022
